message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is my bottom line. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and deliver great value.
